short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get inspired with historical facts and music when opening a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace new tab page with a minimalistic dashboard with interesting facts, curiosa and music that happened on this date historically.

In addition to learning today's date the new tab will display:
- A beautiful toned down nature background
- Historical top 3 billboard hits with play preview on this date
- Historical events on this date and famous people born, visualised by beautiful AI-generated art
- Five daily words to learn in desired language (currently only supports German & Italian)
